name: Carpet Capers
overview: The Lord of the Manor is mad as a hatter. He's asked you and your crazy apprentice to come and lay white carpets all over the manor house but when you get there you find you weren't the only ones invited — and that's where the fun begins. Rival carpetfitters make life difficult and sometimes it's hard to tell whose side your apprentice is on! But that won't stop you finding nine different screens filled with frantic fun and frustration in CARPET CAPERS.
